posts.post_content:
Cross format staple. It's like an [Ancient Ziggurat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancient Ziggurat) that can be used to cast other spells such as [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember).  
  
The additional uncounterability effect is also extremely relevant against potential answers in every format.  
  
**Block**: ?? [Dissipate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dissipate)  
**Standard**: [Mana Leak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Leak)  
**Extended**: [Spellstutter Sprite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spellstutter Sprite), [Cryptic Command](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cryptic Command)  
**Modern**: [Spell Snare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spell Snare), [Remand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Remand)  
**Legacy**: [Mental Misstep](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mental Misstep), [Counterbalance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Counterbalance)  
**Vintage**: [Chalice of the Void](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chalice of the Void) , [Force of Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Force of Will), [Mana Drain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Drain)
posts.html:
Cross format staple. It's like an Ancient Ziggurat that can be used to cast other spells such as Dismember.

The additional uncounterability effect is also extremely relevant against potential answers in every format.

Block: ?? Dissipate
Standard: Mana Leak
Extended: Spellstutter Sprite, Cryptic Command
Modern: Spell Snare, Remand
Legacy: Mental Misstep, Counterbalance
Vintage: Chalice of the Void , Force of Will, Mana Drain

Posted By: adrian.malacoda (4/26/2012 6:11:09 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I'm a huge fan of legacy and this card can be used to really push aggro back into the game. Having force of wills and dazes constantly being used makes it tough to really get a offense going. This card allows you some defense while not being broken. Wastelands are a thing and this feels really balanced with the current meta. You really don't need to be using tribal either to use this effectively. It allows for a lot of options on the draw and protects a threat. Actually getting to stick a Dark Confidant feels nice once in a while.
posts.html:
I'm a huge fan of legacy and this card can be used to really push aggro back into the game. Having force of wills and dazes constantly being used makes it tough to really get a offense going. This card allows you some defense while not being broken. Wastelands are a thing and this feels really balanced with the current meta. You really don't need to be using tribal either to use this effectively. It allows for a lot of options on the draw and protects a threat. Actually getting to stick a Dark Confidant feels nice once in a while.
